title: To Hestia
lines: Queen Hestia, daughter of mighty Kronos, mistress of ever-burning fire, you dwell in the center of the house.
May you raise the holy initiates in these sacred rites, may you grant them unwithering youth, wealth as well, prudence and purity.

Home of the blessed gods, men's mighty buttress, eternal, many-shaped, beloved, grass-yellow, smile, O blessed one, kindly accept these offerings, waft upon us prosperity, breathe upon us gentle-handed health.
